items.title: Re-risking your portfolio: Investor John Davi's picks for the second half of 2025
items.description: Davi advises investors to look away from popular ETFs such as SPY and VOO and instead at ETFs in industrials, energy, real estate and fixed income.

items.description: Shares have gained more than 11% so far in 2025.

items.title: How to avoid these ‘tax torpedoes’ in retirement, per UBS
items.description: Keep a little more of your hard-earned savings by developing a retirement strategy that will help you save on taxes.
